content:
Appo na parthokonga entha allavu Modi govt Christians ethura nadakuthunu.. not only Christians and also Muslims.. 

enga religion India la iruka kudathunu thudikira party Ku Nangal eppadi aatharvu tharuvoum..,https://,twitter.com/kamaljii/statu,s/999166304174182401, ,…
say one instance where Modi govt talks against christians or muslims ?
Plz u give proof for one support of bjp person for Christians and Muslims.. and also check the death rate of pastors and church burned in north side past 4 years.. even in tn it happened..

na ketathu purijitha bro? u said Modi Govt dont want christians and muslims, i am asking give me one instance where he or govt behaves so nu!!unga side Missionaries eppidiyo antha mari intha side radicals irukanga, avangala sonna ungaluku y kovam varuthu, neenga missionary ah

Edwin bro, Naan solli avungalukku puriyaathu.. reason they are guided by their Church heads like this. I know She is true service minded. But I doubt her heads. Modi is not against Christians or Muslims.

The Church heads now cannot get Foreign funds for Conversion. Adhan Kadups
